abstract: The eco-conscious Julie Gilhart shares her must-have high-fashion, low-impact favorites for fall.
snippet: The eco-conscious Julie Gilhart shares her must-have high-fashion, low-impact favorites for fall.
lead_paragraph: With her consulting footprint at Amazon.com and Nordstrom's nonprofit store Treasure and Bond and her work for 1% for the Planet, the eco-conscious Julie Gilhart (above) shares her must-have high-fashion, low-impact favorites for fall. See our interactive feature >>
